Name: Random
Description: A different rule change[;] chosen randomly.

Name: Lady Luck
Description: All enemy equipment is upgraded.

Name: Hothead
Description: You are weak to ice.

Name: Robobot
Description: You are less likely to roll|4s[;] 5s and 6s.

Name: Slime
Description: Poison carries over fights.

Name: Frog
Description: Small equipment is weakened for you.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~if (self.equipment.length > 0) for (eq in self.equipment) if (eq.skillcard == \~\~ && eq.hastag(\~small\~)) eq.animate(WEAKEN);~[;] ~onstartturn~);

Name: Wolf Puppy
Description: Attacks that do [sword]4 damage or less|are doubled for you and enemies.

Name: Rose
Description: Enemies start with [thorns]Thorns.

Name: Dryad
Description: Poison also recovers [heal]3 HP to|the owner after dealing damage.

Name: Baby Squid
Description: All your dice are [blind]Blinded|on the first turn.

Name: Sticky Hands
Description: Lose [gold]4 gold.

Name: Alchemist
Description: Your limit break changes|every floor.

Name: Marshmallow
Description: Start each fight with a random|amount of [fire]Burn and [ice]Freeze[].
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~var fire = runscript(\~megaquest/math/random\~[;] [0[;] self.dice]); var ice = self.dice - fire; if (fire > 0) inflictself(FIRE[;] fire); if (ice > 0) inflictself(ICE[;] ice);~[;] ~startcombat~);

Name: Mimic
Description: Permanently replace one of your|items with Backfire.
Rule Change: if (self.layout == self.layout.EQUIPMENT) {var alleq = []; if (self.equipment.length > 0) for (eq in self.equipment) if (eq.skillcard == ~~) alleq.push(eq); shuffle(alleq); if (alleq.length > 0) {var eq = alleq.pop(); eq.create(~Backfire@mqmimicremix~ + eq.namemodifier); sfx(~mqmimicremix~[;] ~success~);} else sfx(~mqmimicremix~[;] ~fail~);} if (self.layout == self.layout.SPELLBOOK) {var spells = []; for (i in 1...7) if (Spellbook.spellname(i) != ~~) spells.push(i); Spellbook.changespell(rand(spells)[;] ~Backfire@mqmimicremix~); sfx(~mqmimicremix~[;] ~success~);} if (self.layout == self.layout.DECK) {var cards = Deck.getcards(~all~).copy(); shuffle(cards); var c = cards.pop(); c.equipment.create(~Backfire@mqmimicremix~ + c.equipment.namemodifier); c.equipment.resize(2); sfx(~mqmimicremix~[;] ~success~);}

Name: Stereohead
Description: You and your enemies get|[weaken]2 Weaken on even turns.

Name: Sorceress
Description: Everyone gets a random status|effect every turn.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~if (target.hp <= 0) return; var status = rand(loadtext(\~megaquest/remixes/sorceress\~)); inflict(status); inflictself(status); sfx(\~_\~ + status.toLowerCase());~[;] ~beforestartturn~);

Name: Copycat
Description: Randomize your loadout.
Rule Change: if (self.layout == self.layout.EQUIPMENT) {if (self.equipment.length > 0) for (eq in self.equipment.copy()) if (eq.skillcard == ~~) {self.equipment.remove(eq); self.equipment.push(new elements.Equipment(rand(getequipmentlist(null[;] [eq.hastag(~small~) ? ~small~ : ~large~][;] [~skillcard~[;] ~excludefromrandomlists~[;] ~robotonly~[;] ~witchonly~[;] ~onceperbattle~[;] ~alternateversion~])) + eq.namemodifier)); eq.dispose();}} if (self.layout == self.layout.SPELLBOOK) for (i in 1...7) if (Spellbook.spellname(i) != ~~) Spellbook.changespell(i[;] rand(getequipmentlist(null[;] [~spell~][;] [~skillcard~[;] ~excludefromrandomlists~[;] ~robotonly~[;] ~onceperbattle~[;] ~alternateversion~]))); if (self.layout == self.layout.DECK) {var substitutions = {from: [][;] to: []}; for (c in Deck.getcards(~all~).copy()) {if (substitutions.from.indexOf(c.equipment.name) != -1) continue; var includetags = []; var excludetags = [~skillcard~[;] ~excludefromrandomlists~[;] ~robotonly~[;] ~witchonly~[;] ~onceperbattle~[;] ~alternateversion~]; if (!c.equipment.hastag(~finale~)) excludetags.push(~finale~); else includetags.push(~finale~); substitutions.from.push(c.equipment.name); substitutions.to.push(rand(getequipmentlist(null[;] includetags[;] excludetags)));} trace(substitutions); for (c in Deck.getcards(~all~).copy()) {var i = substitutions.from.indexOf(c.equipment.name); c.equipment = new elements.Equipment(substitutions.to[i] + c.equipment.namemodifier); c.equipment.resize(2);}}

Name: Keymaster
Description: You must use dice in the|order of rolling.

Name: Bully
Description: Take [sword]10 damage.

Name: Handyman
Description: Attacks that do [sword]6 or more damage|also inflict [shock]Shock[].

Name: Fireman
Description: Burn also reduces dice value.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~runscript(\~megaquest/repeatcall\~[;] [function (args[;] actuator) {if (self.getvar(\~mqcombatend\~) == 1 # target.getvar(\~mqcombatend\~) == 1) {actuator._repeat = 0;} else {var alldice = []; if (self.dicepool.length > 0) for (mydice in self.dicepool) alldice.push(mydice); if (target.dicepool.length > 0) for (mydice in target.dicepool) alldice.push(mydice); if (alldice.length > 0) for (mydice in alldice) if (mydice.animation.length > 0) for (anim in mydice.animation) if (anim.command[0] == \~soundevent\~ && anim.parameter[0] == \~_diceburn\~ && anim.command[4] == \~overlaytile\~ && anim.parameter[4] == \~fire\~ && anim.command[5] == \~reducestat\~ && (anim.parameter[5] == \~fire\~ # anim.parameter[5] == \~alternate_fire\~) && anim.command[6] == \~applyvariable\~ && (anim.parameter[6] == \~fire\~ # anim.parameter[6] == \~alternate_fire\~) && anim.p1[6] == 0) {anim.p1[6] = 1; anim.addcommand(\~nudge\~);}}}[;] 0[;] -1]);~[;] ~startcombat~);

Name: Haunted Jar
Description: Purple equipment is upgraded|in battle.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~runscript(\~megaquest/repeatcall\~[;] [function (args[;] actuator) {if (self.getvar(\~mqcombatend\~) == 1 # target.getvar(\~mqcombatend\~) == 1) {actuator._repeat = 0;} else {var alleq = []; if (self.equipment.length > 0) for (eq in self.equipment) alleq.push(eq); if (target.equipment.length > 0) for (eq in target.equipment) alleq.push(eq); if (alleq.length > 0) for (eq in alleq) if (eq.equipmentcol == 5 && eq.namemodifier != \~+\~ && eq.namemodifier != \~-\~) {var x = eq.x; var y = eq.y; var finalpos = eq.finalpos; eq.create(eq.name + \~+\~); eq.x = x; eq.y = y; eq.finalpos = finalpos;}}}[;] 0[;] -1]);~[;] ~startcombat~);

Name: Cactus
Description: Green things gain an extra dice.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~var greenthings = loadtext(\~megaquest/remixes/cactus\~); for (greenthing in greenthings) {if (self.name == greenthing) self.bonusdice++; if (target.name == greenthing) target.bonusdice++;}~[;] ~beforestartturn~);

Name: Vacuum
Description: You and your enemies have|one less dice.

Name: Dire Wolf
Description: Your equipment is replaced with the|enemy equipment on the first turn.

Name: Crystalina
Description: Every turn[;] one of your equipment|becomes harder to play.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~var alleq = []; if (self.equipment.length > 0) for (eq in self.equipment) if (eq.skillcard == \~\~ && eq.ready) alleq.push(eq); shuffle(alleq); if (alleq.length > 0) {var eq = alleq.pop(); runscript(\~megaquest/makeequipmenthardertoplay\~[;] [eq[;] 1]);}~[;] ~onstartturn~);

Name: Snowman
Description: Frozen dice become 0.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~runscript(\~megaquest/repeatcall\~[;] [function (args[;] actuator) {if (self.getvar(\~mqcombatend\~) == 1 # target.getvar(\~mqcombatend\~) == 1) {actuator._repeat = 0;} else {var alldice = []; if (self.dicepool.length > 0) for (mydice in self.dicepool) alldice.push(mydice); if (target.dicepool.length > 0) for (mydice in target.dicepool) alldice.push(mydice); if (alldice.length > 0) for (mydice in alldice) if (mydice.animation.length > 0) for (anim in mydice.animation) if (anim.command[0] == \~soundevent\~ && anim.parameter[0] == \~_dicefreeze\~ && anim.command[1] == \~overlaytileonce\~ && anim.parameter[1] == \~ice\~ && anim.command[4] == \~changetovalue\~ && anim.p1[4] == 1 && anim.command[5] == \~reducestat\~ && anim.parameter[5] == \~ice\~) anim.p1[4] = 0;}}[;] 0[;] -1]);~[;] ~startcombat~);

Name: Loud Bird
Description: CAW! CAW! CAW!
Rule Change: runscript(~megaquest/repeatcall~[;] [function (args[;] actuator) {var n = rand([1[;] 2[;] 3[;] 4[;] 5[;] 6]); for (i in 0...2) sfx(~mqloudbirdremix~[;] n);}[;] 15[;] -1]);

Name: Rotten Apple
Description: -50% health to everyone.

Name: Wisp
Description: On the first turn[;] roll 1 extra|dice and gain [vanish]Vanish[].

Name: Cowboy
Description: Every time you roll a 6[;]|it gets thrown for [sword]6 damage.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~runscript(\~megaquest/repeatcall\~[;] [function (args[;] actuator) {if (self.getvar(\~mqcombatend\~) == 1 # target.getvar(\~mqcombatend\~) == 1) {actuator._repeat = 0;} else {if (self.dicepool.length > 0) for (mydice in self.dicepool) if (!mydice.intween() && mydice.available() && mydice.basevalue == 6) {var act = new motion.actuators.SimpleActuator(mydice[;] 0.5[;] {y: -500}); var func = new hscript.Parser().parseString(\~if (target.hp > 0) {attack(6); sfx(mysfx);} mydice.consumedice();\~); var interp = new hscript.Interp(); interp.variables.set(\~attack\~[;] args[0]); interp.variables.set(\~sfx\~[;] args[1]); interp.variables.set(\~mysfx\~[;] \~_magic\~); interp.variables.set(\~target\~[;] args[2]); interp.variables.set(\~mydice\~[;] mydice); act.onComplete(interp.execute[;] [func]); act.move(); mydice.consumed = true; } }}[;] 0[;] -1[;] attack[;] sfx[;] target]);~[;] ~startcombat~);

Name: Warlock
Description: Status effects are different.

Name: Banshee
Description: Curse equipment is more common.
Rule Change: var database = loaddata(~diceydungeons/remixes/banshee~); for (data in database) if (data.character == self.name) Rules.substitute(data.replace_equipment[;] data.curse_equipment);

Name: Cornelius
Description: Die on your 6th turn.

Name: Paper Knight
Description: [fire]Burn is doubled.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~runscript(\~megaquest/repeatcall\~[;] [function (args[;] actuator) {if (self.getvar(\~mqcombatend\~) == 1 # target.getvar(\~mqcombatend\~) == 1) {actuator._repeat = 0;} else {if (getstatusself(FIRE) > self.getvar(\~mqpaperknightremix\~)) inflictself(FIRE[;] getstatusself(FIRE) - self.getvar(\~mqpaperknightremix\~)); self.setvar(\~mqpaperknightremix\~[;] getstatusself(FIRE)); if (getstatus(FIRE) > target.getvar(\~mqpaperknightremix\~)) inflict(FIRE[;] getstatus(FIRE) - target.getvar(\~mqpaperknightremix\~)); target.setvar(\~mqpaperknightremix\~[;] getstatus(FIRE));}}[;] 0[;] -1]);~[;] ~startcombat~);

Name: Skeleton
Description: [curse]Curse also inflicts [vanish]Vanish[].
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~runscript(\~megaquest/repeatcall\~[;] [function (args[;] actuator) {if (self.getvar(\~mqcombatend\~) == 1 # target.getvar(\~mqcombatend\~) == 1) {actuator._repeat = 0;} else {if (getstatusself(VANISH) == 0 && getstatusself(CURSE) > self.getvar(\~mqskeletonremix\~)) {inflictself(VANISH); sfx(\~_vanish\~[;] \~\~[;] 0.2);} self.setvar(\~mqskeletonremix\~[;] getstatusself(CURSE)); if (getstatus(VANISH) == 0 && getstatus(CURSE) > target.getvar(\~mqskeletonremix\~)) {inflict(VANISH); sfx(\~_vanish\~[;] \~\~[;] 0.2);} target.setvar(\~mqskeletonremix\~[;] getstatus(CURSE));}}[;] 0[;] -1]);~[;] ~startcombat~);

Name: Singer
Description: Everyone recovers [heal]8 health|on the 4th turn.

Name: Gargoyle
Description: Each equipment use reduces|your dice values by 1.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~if (self.dicepool.length > 0) for (mydice in self.dicepool) if (mydice.available() && !mydice.intween() && mydice.basevalue > 1) {mydice.basevalue -= 1; mydice.animate(\~flashshake\~); runscript(\~megaquest/textparticle\~[;] [mydice[;] \~-1\~[;] 0xFFFFFF]);}~[;] ~playerequipmentuse~);

Name: Bounty Hunter
Description: Enemies drop [gold]3 gold[;]|but they drop gold only on turn 3.

Name: Madison
Description: Lose all gold. Gain [fury]Fury for|the next 12 turns.
Rule Change: if (self.getvar(~mqmadisonremix_start~) == 0) {self.gold = 0; self.setvar(~mqmadisonremix_start~[;] 1); self.setvar(~mqmadisonremix~[;] 12);} Rules.addextrascript(~if (self.getvar(\~mqmadisonremix\~) > 0) inflictself(\~mqmadisonremix\~[;] self.getvar(\~mqmadisonremix\~));~[;] ~startcombat~);

Name: Buster
Description: All attacks [fire]BURN!

Name: Audrey
Description: You and your enemies inflict|[weaken]Weaken for every 3 attacks.

Name: Aoife
Description: [shield]Shield also recovers [heal]3 health|when inflicted.

Name: Drake
Description: Enemies regenerate [heart]2 health|on each attack.

Name: Scathach
Description: You and your enemies have only|one dice on the first turn.

Name: The Warrior
Description: The boss gets 50% more health.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~if (target.level + (target.hassuper ? 1 : 0) >= 6) {var add = target.maxhp * 0.5; target.maxhp += add; target.hp += add;}~[;] ~startcombat~);

Name: The Thief
Description: The boss borrows one of your|equipment every turn.

Name: The Robot
Description: The boss gains a random|blessing every turn.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~if (target.level + (target.hassuper ? 1 : 0) >= 6) {var a = rand([SHIELD[;] REDUCE[;] DODGE[;] FURY]); var c = 1; if (a == SHIELD) c = 6; if (a == REDUCE) c = 2; inflict(a[;] c); sfx(\~_\~ + a.toLowerCase());}~[;] ~beforestartturn~);

Name: The Inventor
Description: The boss gets upgraded equipment.

Name: The Witch
Description: The boss gets a random|equipment every turn.

Name: The Jester
